title: Anyone know how long the NA servers are supposed to be down for?
body:
kinda of bored with no league q.q

Edit: 11:30 AM EST, league servers still down D:

Edit 2: 12:00 PM EST, league servers still down D::::

Edit 3: Almost 1:00 PM EST, league servers still down D'::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Edit 4: ITS UP!

replies.body: Someone on here said 10:30 est. I hope they are right ;)

> [{quoted}](name=nerak23,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-28T15:03:35.352+0000)
>
> Someone on here said 10:30 est. I hope they are right ;)

I realize that I'm kind of addicted when I panic that the servers are down
ME too...... I keep refreshing the server status page as if its going to change -__-{{champion:25}}

> [{quoted}](name=Visiblehades2,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-28T15:10:33.955+0000)
>
> I realize that I'm kind of addicted when I panic that the servers are down

3:00 est is when they are supposed to be up...i think
its 10:32 and the server is still down {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=The Pro Of Noobs,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-01-28T15:32:20.326+0000)
>
> its 10:32 and the server is still down {{item:3070}}

Awe this sucks why did I get out of bed this morning Q.Q
6 hours estimated time as usual. So 9am PST or 12pm EST.

> [{quoted}](name=Nya Poptart Cat,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-28T15:23:12.035+0000)
>
> 6 hours estimated time as usual. So 9am PST or 12pm EST.

I cant not play until 12 D:

> [{quoted}](name=Visiblehades2,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-01-28T15:26:27.501+0000)
>
> I cant not play until 12 D:

They having a rough patch this time so I'm honestly expecting it to get extended and hour or two...
i'm probably gonna die... this means i'm going to have to actually interact with the outside world :(

> [{quoted}](name=hollingsheadc,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T16:06:44.853+0000)
>
> i'm probably gonna die... this means i'm going to have to actually interact with the outside world :(

The outside what?
I have two free periods first, which I was gonna use for league, but now since the server is down I better just do Homework.  Ugh. I hate being productive when I could be playing league....

> [{quoted}](name=JD Phoenix,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-01-28T16:25:18.376+0000)
>
> I have two free periods first, which I was gonna use for league, but now since the server is down I better just do Homework.  Ugh. I hate being productive when I could be playing league....

I think I probably failed one of my exams, because I spent study time playing league...

Get on my level. 

I KNOW I failed more then one exam due to league.

Afroman - Because I Got High

everytime he says "because I got high", insert "because I played leauge"
Whell its 12pm and still unavailable, update says patch is still in progress but doesn't give a new ETA
ya i dont get why they wouldnt inform the players
Because last time some maintenance (well, the server upgrade) took longer than they thought, they kept having to push back the time, and people kept being mad each time they pushed back the time.
why not just tell us 3 or 4 so no one is sitting at the comp waiting
Because we all know we would sit here anyway

http://i.imgur.com/hOZnw0X.jpg

{{item:3070}} but its sooo true though

I'd guess the following:

- They hope they'll have the servers up in, say, 1 hour.
- If they tell people 3 or 4, people will get mad that it's taking so long.
  - Even if it *actually* goes online after 1 hour.
- As I said earlier, if they tell people it'll be 1 hour and then it takes 3-4, people will be mad.
Anyone else notice every other server from EU West to Oceania are up... NA you know. Home servers of Riot are the only ones still under maintenance....
Probably 4 days.
lmao.... i need to play now
me 2

I tried to play a game as soon as the servers went up, but after champ select I went into immediate bugsplat. Can't reconnect after many repeated attempts.

Hope I don't get banned from this :/
i really just wanna play, now i have to start getting ready for work:/ i was hoping to be able to play at some point today :/
dude wtf, they should be up by now
Almost 9AM PST / 12PM EST.  Hopefully it's about to be back up.

> [{quoted}](name=Miku Lv101,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-01-28T16:49:35.398+0000)
>
> Almost 9AM PST / 12PM EST.  Hopefully it's about to be back up.

Wanna count down with me, like they do on New Years eve lol
Woke up at 630am and "patched" went back to bed because it was down.... almost 12pm and still down. *cries*

> its 10:32 and the server is still down 

11:13  awww I was just going to try :((  guess I'll finish watching Moonshiners hahaha

> [{quoted}](name=nerak23,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-28T16:14:18.733+0000)
>
> 11:13  awww I was just going to try :((  guess I'll finish watching Moonshiners hahaha

I'm still crying.
Server status stated it started at 3AM PST and will last 6 hours. That would put it at 9AM PST or noon EST.
I thought it said it started at 1:30AM PST , which would have had them coming back on around 10:30 AM EST, regardless they've just posted an update saying they are still working on maintenance...
I'm glad Riot is giving us updates on it regularly though.....oh wait....that's other games.

> I realize that I'm kind of addicted when I panic that the servers are down

LMOA  your not the only one :)  I waiting 2.

I'm expecting NA to get IP boosts and free skins because of this. 
Meanwhile EUW never gets compensation{{item:3070}}

I tried to play a game as soon as the servers went up, but after champ select I went into immediate bugsplat. Can't reconnect after many repeated attempts.

Hope I don't get banned from this :/
thereisnourflevel
League Servers will never be up again the Company went Bankrupt Kappa

its up!!

yay im in!!

Its up now!!! Yay!!! I can finally get back to playing Braum!!!
{{champion:201}}
It's up,  hallelujah!

This happens literally EVERY time there is a somewhat big patch. But for some reason it's ONLY the NA, and not any other servers, that require increased maintenance? Can someone tell me why this is? I honestly can't say I've EVER seen a time where other servers required increased maintenance besides NA. All the other servers went back online literally hours ago now.

Sad but way too true... NA players wait longer then literally every other player..... No logic and beyond frustrating to accidentally click on EU West and notice they are online at 10 am....

Literally opposite of what should be expected. Let all the other servers wait while you fix the ones here.....

> [{quoted}](name=Visiblehades2,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ZLB3sYI4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-28T14:51:53.272+0000)
>
> kinda of bored with no league q.q
> 
> Edit: 11:30 AM EST, league servers still down D:
> 
> Edit 2: 12:00 PM EST, league servers still down D::::
> 
> Edit 3: Almost 1:00 PM EST, league servers still down D'::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Thereisnourflevel
It's now going on 1 o'clock EST... Riot's garrrrbagggeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!
Had to go down on my weekend.  Woke up today, smiled as i got out of bed.  Then frowned when I saw the servers were down.  Hmmmmmm what to do, what to do.{{item:3157}}
